items.raw_desc: Tartó Blazepod Cone Adapter (tartó kúphoz) 2 db-os kiszerelés:This cone adapter expands the possibilities of training with BlazePod interactive lights and brings a new level of variability and dynamism. The holder allows the lights to be firmly attached to most common training cones, turning a routine exercise into a complex workout on reaction, coordination and spatial perception. The Blazepod is ideal for ball sports such as football, basketball or handball, but is also great for gyms, physiotherapy offices or school sports facilities. Thanks to the simple deployment, you can quickly change the position of the lights according to the type of training or the age of the trainees. In addition, the BlazePod system uses visual stimuli to naturally stimulate the senses, resulting in more efficient and motivating performance. Each package contains two adapter heads. If you are using the complete six-light set, you will need three packs. We recommend combining the adapters with cones with a wide and stable base for optimal functionality and safety during exercise....
